value.value: A circumscribed collection of purulent exudate frequently associated with swelling and other signs of inflammation.

definition.value: Generally occur following damage or infection with subsequent inflammatory response. Result of the body`s defensive reaction to foreign material.

value.value: A disease of the heart muscle or myocardium proper.

definition.value: Cardiomyopathies may be classified as either primary or secondary, on the basis of etiology, or on the pathophysiology of the lesion: hypertrophic, dilated, or restrictive.

value.value: Abnormal retention of lipids within a cell. Physically apparent as lipid within liposomes of parenchymal cells.

definition.value: Most commonly associated with degenerative change in the liver.

value.value: Increase in the diameter of an orifice or tubular structure beyond its normal dimensions.
A blind ended outpouching through the wall of a tubular organ or bounded cavity.
An abnormal passage between two internal organs or leading from a cavity to the body surface.
Benign stromal tumors of the soft tissue with skeletal muscle differentiation.
Systemic manifestation of MPATH: 407.

A focal malformation resembling a neoplasm which results from faulty development of an organ; composed of an abnormal mixture of tissue elements, or an abnormal proportion of a single element. Growth and location are usually normal for that tissue cf. Heterotopia/Choristoma MPATH:76/MPATH:477.
Localised dilation of an artery or heart chamber usually due to an acquired or congenital weakness of the wall of the artery or chamber.
脂肪組織の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the connective tissue composed of fat cells enmeshed in areolar tissue
褐色脂肪組織量の増加
increased amount of the thermogenic form of adipose tissue that is composed of brown adipocytes
白色脂肪組織量の増加
increased quantity of fat-storing cells/tissue
腹部脂肪体形態異常
any structural anomaly of the encapsulated adipose tissue in the abdomen
脂肪組織分布異常
alterations in the normal placement of body fat
耳の色素沈着異常
anomaly in the coloration of the skin of the outer ear due to changes in the amount, shape, or distribution of cells producing pigment
耳の巨大化
outer ears of a greater than normal size
耳の矮小化
outer ears of a smaller than normal size
厚い耳
increased width of the epidermal and cartilaginous tissue that makes up the ear
鱗状の耳
loss of the outer layer of the epidermis of the ears in thick, dry scale-like patches
突出した耳
protuberant outer ears
耳の形態異常
any anomaly in the characteristic surface outline or contour of the external ear
耳の配置異常
anomaly in the space between or the placement of the outer ears
耳の低い配置
outer ears are situated below the normal location often giving the perception of protruding from the head
両耳隔離症
greater than normal space between the outer ears
内耳の形態異常
any structural anomaly of any components of the labyrinth, including the semicircular canals, vestibule and cochlea
前庭上部の形態異常
any structural anomaly in the part of the vestibular ganglion that receives fibers from the maculae of the utricle and the sacculae and the ampullae of the anterior and lateral semicircular ducts
槌骨の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the largest of the three auditory ossicles, which resembles a club or hammer
鼓室輪の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the bony ring at the ear canal to which the tympanic membrane is attached
蝸牛の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the spiral-shaped bony canal in the inner ear containing the hair cells that transduce sound
蝸牛の退行変性
a retrogressive impairment of function or destruction of the spiral-shaped bony canal in the inner ear containing the hair cells that transduce sound
中心階の欠如
missing spiral tube within the cochlea that contains the organ of Corti, the neuroepithelial receptor organ for hearing
前庭の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the cavity between the semicircular canals and the cochlea of the inner ear
膜迷路の異常
any structural anomaly of the complex arrangement of communicating canaliculi and sacs suspended within the cavity of the bony labyrinth of the inner ear
半規管の欠如
missing organ of balance; consists of three bony tubes within which the semicircular ducts are located
外側骨半規管の異常
any structural anomaly of the lateral long bony tube of the labyrinth that is involved in the sense of balance
耳嚢の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the cartilage or bony capsule surrounding the inner ear mechanism
中耳骨片の欠如
missing small bones of the tympanic cavity
内リンパ管の欠如
missing small membranous canal of the inner ear; connecting membranous labyrinth with the endolymphatic sac
コルチ器官の異常
any structural anomaly associated with the highly specialized epithelium in the floor of the ductus cochlearis; also referred to a spiral organ (organum spirale), or acoustic papilla
コルチ器官の退行変性
a retrogressive impairment of function or destruction of all or part the highly specialized epithelium in the floor of the ductus cochlearis
コルチ器官の欠如
absence of the highly specialized epithelium in the floor of the ductus cochlearis
有毛細胞の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the sensory epithelial cells of the inner ear
膨大部溝の形態異常
any structural anomaly of the transverse groove on the membranous amupulla of each semicircular duct, where the nerve enters the ampullary crest
血管条の異常

any structural anomaly in the stratified, secretory epithelium which lines the upper part of the cochlear spiral ligament and maintains potassium ion homeostasis in the endolymph; stria vascularis normally consists of marginal, intermediate, and basal cells: basal and marginal cell tight junctions preclude paracellular diffusion into and out of the intrastrial space while basal and intermediate cells secrete into this space potassium ions derived from fibrocytes through gap junctions
中耳の形態異常
any structural anomaly of any components of the tympanic cavity or its ossicles
耳の早期展開
early onset of the opening and spreading out of the outer ear
耳の過剰発達
overly robust development of the ear
耳の発生遅延
late onset of the growth of the outer ear
